body.name: TV Stand Dresser with Power Outlets and LED Lights, 4 Drawers Entertainment Center with Open Shelf, Media Console for 50 43 Inch TV, Dresser with PU Finish, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 40 mins
features: 【LED TV STAND】Turn on the light strips on the TV stand with an RF remote, this 4 drawer dresser's 20 changeable colours and 22 dynamic modes will enhance your binge-watching or TV gaming ambiences, and constant and breathing lighting modes help you fully immerse in, memory function stays the last mode and let you restart at any time. Plus: Contain patent pending drawer slide

【DRESSER WITH POWER OUTLETS】Tired of tangled wires? Our TV entertainment center comes with 2 AC outlets and 2 USB ports, turning it into a charging hub for your TV, Wi-Fi router, and gaming gears. Keep everything organized on the open shelf, maintaining a clutter-free TV console table

【SUPPORT TV & AMPLE STORAGE】Want a TV stand without taking a lot of space? Look at it. 4 fabric drawers with PU finish, spacious desktop and open shelf offer sufficient storage for your TV accessaries. The detachable middle shelf can store tall or short items like loudspeaker box. This TV stand with storage is also a reliable support for your TV (Up to 50 inches）

【MUCH STABLER AND SAFER】Crafted from durable particleboard, a sturdy metal frame and firm fabric drawers, this bedroom dresser stands the test of time. Balanced adjustable feet and an anti-tip device ensure stability, even on uneven floors

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE, VERSATILE USES】Worried about assembly? Fear not! Our dresser tv stand includes detailed instructions, numbered components, and all the tools you need for a hassle-free setup. Once assembled, this 50 inch tv stand's sleek design seamlessly blends into bedrooms, living rooms, nurseries, hallway or closets, providing additional storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was simple and quick to put together. I replaced my son's gaming desk with this and its beautiful. Everything has a spot now and it holds a 43inch tv well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it!! Took me 30 mins to assemble, super easy! Very well built and sturdy! I was surprised at how sturdy it actually is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bedroom stand.
reviews.reviewText: In my bedroom I sometimes find myself rearranging the furniture for the ultimate space saving and space utilization. While the cardboard drawers are light weight, I wouldn't expect to overwhelm the drawers with too weight. As the drawers are held on by bars with no center support. The the LED effects is a simple LED strip with double sided adhesive so it's up to you to pick it he optimal location for the best effect; just plug into an available USB whether it's the one supplied or into a separate location. The remote is self explanatory but lacks modes like simple transitions like fade to color or marquee style. The overall construction is simple and one e you figure out what screw goes to what you'll be able to figure it out without the instructions. The build itself feels sturdy gives off a premium look and feel.While I have this in my bedroom this would definitely save space in an small office or dorm. The description says it holds up to a 50inch I have a 55inch Neo QLED TV set with a centeree base and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like advertised
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and looks good. I like that there is a plug in on the stand along with USB ports. Holds more than I thought it would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to follow instructions. Nice looking piece, exactly as described. My son loves the LED lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this entertainment center for my teenage son’s room. It looks great and the quality surprised me. I was afraid it would feel cheap, but it’s really sturdy. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I can say nice is that they give you a sturdy screwdriver set. Which is completely useless when putting this TV stand together. They give you a double sided Phillips head and Flat head bit that you put into the handle. Which is only used at the end when of the installation. Could've added the right bit for the job.The feet that goes onto the stand where all there except for the 1 screw hole that wasn't made right. After a few times of trying to screw it in, I took it out and the picture shows why. They never made the part right.There's a couple of holes missing on one of the metal brackets that I had to leave blank until I can get the correct drill bit to fix it myself. Several of the holes that was actually there didn't line up to the actual hole in the other part. So hole A didn't line up to hole B.I wouldn't recommend this product. Quality from them is low and it's not functioning the way that it was designed for.
